column3: reverse parenting. While past generations of parents in China maintained a serious demeanor and relied on punishments as a form of discipline, the post-â€™90s generation is embracing a different approach: When their kids lay on the floor in an ice cream store, parents do the same. åˆåŒ (hÃ©tong), æ‰¿åŠ (chÃ©ngbÃ n), æ”¶ç¼© (shÅusuÅ)

For example, you can use æ‰¿åŒ… (chÃ©ngbÄo) when referring to contracting or taking on a specific project, while åˆåŒ (hÃ©tong) would be used to describe a formal contract or agreement. If you are talking about organizing an event, you might use æ‰¿åŠ (chÃ©ngbÃ n), and if you are referring to physical or economic contraction, you would use æ”¶ç¼© (shÅusuÅ).
